titles.title: TEAM TELECOM Act
TEAM TELECOM Act
Timely Evaluation of Acquisitions, Mergers, or Transactions with External, Lawful Entities to Clear Owners and Management Act
To amend the National Telecommunications and Information Administration Organization Act to establish an interagency national security review process, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

ASSUMING FIRST SPONSORSHIP - Mr. Weber (TX) asked unanimous consent that he may hereafter be considered as the first sponsor of H.R. 4506, a bill originally introduced by Representative Johnson (OH), for the purpose of adding cosponsors and requesting reprintings pursuant to clause 7 of rule XII. Agreed to without objection.
